heading: Today
text: Patchy valley fog, then mostly sunny skies north, partly cloudy south.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear. Chance of patchy valley fog.40s, 50s in the western valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Patchy fog early, then mostly to partly sunny.
temperature: Upper 60s to mid 70s north, mid 70s to around 80 south.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny after any morning fog.
